PERSONAE.TITLE: Dramatis Personae

PGROUP.GRPDESCR: twin brothers, and sons to Aegeon and Aemilia.
twin brothers, and attendants on the two Antipholuses.

PERSONAE.PERSONA: First Merchant, friend to Antipholus of Syracuse.
Second Merchant, to whom Angelo is a debtor.
AEMILIA, wife to Aegeon, an abbess at Ephesus.
ADRIANA, wife to Antipholus of Ephesus.

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. A hall in DUKE SOLINUS'S palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter DUKE SOLINUS, AEGEON, Gaoler, Officers, and other
Attendants

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. The Mart.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter ANTIPHOLUS of Syracuse, DROMIO of Syracuse,
and First Merchant

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. The house of ANTIPHOLUS of Ephesus.
SCENE I. Before the house of ANTIPHOLUS of Ephesus.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter ANTIPHOLUS of Ephesus, DROMIO of Ephesus,
ANGELO, and BALTHAZAR

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. The same.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter LUCIANA and ANTIPHOLUS of Syracuse

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. A public place.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter Second Merchant, ANGELO, and an Officer

Enter ANTIPHOLUS of Ephesus and DROMIO of Ephesus
from the courtezan's
Enter DROMIO of Syracuse, from the bay

Exeunt Second Merchant, Angelo, Officer, and
Antipholus of Ephesus

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. The house of ANTIPHOLUS of Ephesus.
SCENE III. A public place.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Exeunt Antipholus of Syracuse and Dromio of Syracuse

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. A street.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter ANTIPHOLUS of Ephesus and the Officer

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Enter DROMIO of Ephesus with a rope's-end

SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter ADRIANA, LUCIANA, the Courtezan, and PINCH

Enter three or four, and offer to bind him.
He strives
They offer to bind Dromio of Ephesus

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ADRIANA
SPEECH.STAGEDIR:
Exeunt all but Adriana, Luciana, Officer and
Courtezan

SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter ANTIPHOLUS of Syracuse with his rapier drawn,
and DROMIO of Syracuse

Exeunt all but Antipholus of Syracuse and Dromio
of Syracuse

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. A street before a Priory.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter ANTIPHOLUS of Syracuse and DROMIO of Syracuse
Enter ADRIANA, LUCIANA, the Courtezan, and others

Exeunt Antipholus of Syracuse and Dromio of Syracuse
to the Priory

Enter DUKE SOLINUS, attended; AEGEON bareheaded; with the
Headsman and other Officers
Enter ANTIPHOLUS of Ephesus and DROMIO of Ephesus

Re-enter AEMILIA, with ANTIPHOLUS of Syracuse and
DROMIO of Syracuse

Exeunt all but Antipholus of Syracuse, Antipholus
of Ephesus, Dromio of Syracuse and Dromio of Ephesus
Exeunt Antipholus of Syracuse and Antipholus of Ephesus
